cmp: 占 (to observe/to divine, to divine, to occupy/to constitute/to make up/to account)
mng: to stick, to paste, to post (e.g. on a blog), to keep close to, to fit snugly, to subsidize, allowance (e.g. money for food or housing), sticker, classifier for sticking plaster: strip

exm.mng: to stick, to paste, to post (e.g. on a blog), to keep close to, to fit snugly, to subsidize, allowance (e.g. money for food or housing), sticker, classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to stick sth up (on the wall), to post (on a noticeboard or website)
to press close to, to snuggle close, intimate
to discount the interest on a bill of exchange
to stick, to affix, to adhere, to paste (as in "copy and paste"), Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1], also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]
to subsidize, subsidy, allowance, to supplement (one's salary etc), benefit
worn next to the skin, close-fitting, personal (servant etc)
to stick close to, to press up against
